title: Folder upload, creation, and download
body:
I need to select multiple files to be downloaded/uploaded one time
not one by one each time

comments.body: I have modified one of the samples in the WIndowsDevicePortalWrapper library to allow mass file upload to a device or mass file deletion on a device (in my case, the Hololens). Would anyone like me to post the code?
This was suggested 7 months ago, how is it not a thing yet? It's very basic for a file explorer to be able to create or upload entire folders...
UI not suitable for windows 10....change it. allow multiple file transfer. Not showing some folders. Fix it. If it displays phones screen in PC it will be better.Keep improve.
